title: Handle Shipping Address Change Request
description: A customer calls to change the shipping address for an order that has not yet been shipped.

tasks.description: Find the customer's order and verify its current status.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the order status is 'Processing' and not yet 'Shipped'.

tasks.description: Update the shipping address on the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully enters the new shipping address.

tasks.description: Recalculate shipping costs for the new address and inform the customer if there is a difference.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent informs the customer of a small increase in shipping cost due to the new address.
